mapper.select: select * from ${tableName} where addr=#{meterAddress} and centerID = #{centerId} and readDate=#{day}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tableName} (addr varchar(20) not NULL, readDate int not NULL, centerID int not NULL, showValue numeric(19,4), fshowValue numeric(19,4), meterState int, commState int, isUse int, readTime datetime, enprNo varchar(20), PRIMARY KEY (addr,readDate,centerID))
update ${tableName} set showValue=#{data},fshowValue=#{data},meterState=#{state},commState=#{state},readTime=#{now} where addr=#{meterAddress} and centerID = #{centerId} and readDate=#{day}
update ${tableName} set meterState=#{valveState} where addr=#{meterAddress} and centerID = #{centerId} and readDate=#{day}
